mdRecord.dcterms:title: Oeuures francoises de Ioachim Du-Bellay, gentil homme Angeuin, & poëte excellent de ce temps
Oeuvres francoises de Joachim Du-Bellay
Du Bellay, Joachim, approximately 1522-1560. Works. 1569
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Du Bellay, Joachim, approximately 1522-1560 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reueuës, & de nouueau augmentees de plusieurs poësies non encores auparauant imprimees. [original]

Defense et illustration de la langue francoise -- L'olive, et autres oeuures poetiques -- Recueil de poesie presente a tresillustre princesse Madame Marguerite -- Deux liures de l'Eneide de Virgile -- Diuers poemes de I. Du Bellay -- Les regrets, et autres oeuures poetiques -- Diuers ieux rustiques -- Epithaleme sur le mariage de tres-illustre Prince Philabert Emanuel ... & tres-illustre Princesse Marguerite de France.
Signatures: a⁸b⁴ A-E⁸ A-K⁸ A-M⁸ A-L⁸ A-G⁸H⁴ A-H⁸ A-K⁸ A-I⁸. [original]
Epistre au Roy signed, in print: G. Aubert. [original]
Special title-pages (dated 1569 or 1568), and separate pagination and signatures for each of the titles listed in contents. [original]
Includes French and Latin versions of "Tumbeau du treschrestien roy Henry II" (leaves 24v-30, last group) [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Chambolle-Duru. Bookplate of Maurice Tezenas. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 636. [original]
